name: Caffe Mocha
description: It’s a quintessential mocha packed with chocolate and coffee blended in just the right amount. If you can’t decide whether you want to order coffee or hot chocolate, a caffé mocha is a great choice.

name: Caffe Latte
description: This is the perfect drink for a hot day. Its a latte with a hint of espresso and a touch of milk. It’s a great way to start your day.

name: Caffe Americano
description: This is a shot of espresso with hot water.

name: Matcha Green Tea Latte
description: This is a latte with a hint of matcha green tea. Its a great way to start your day.

name: Caffe Vanilla Latte
description: This is a latte with a hint of vanilla. Its a great way to start your day.

name: Caffe Espresso
description: This is a shot of espresso.

name: Caramel Frappuccino
description: This is a frappuccino with a hint of caramel. Its a great way to start your day.

name: Pink Drink
description: Strawberry acai refresher with coconut milk for some added thickness and flavor.
This is a lemonade with a hint of raspberry and green tea. It’s bougie.

description: This is a frappuccino with a hint of vanilla. Its a great way to start your day.
